XALAN_CPP_NAMESPACE_BEGIN XALAN_USING_XERCES (
          
          
Locator )
          
        


      

    		
  





  

    
       
    
    



This class defines a base class for Locator derivations in Xalan.


It was defined because Xerces made changes in their Locator class which caused turbulence.
